First.title: First post
First.content: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy ? Caught in a landslide No escape from reality

Second.title: Second post
Second.content: Open your eyes Look up to the skies and see I 'm just a poor boy I need no sympathy

Thrid.title: Thrid post
Thrid.content: Mama, just killed a man Put a gun against his head Pulled my trigger, now he 's dead Mama, life had just begun But now I 've gone and thrown it all away

Fourth.title: Fourth post
Fourth.content: Mama, oh! Didn't mean to make you cry If I 'm not back again this time tomorrow Carry on, carry on As if nothing really matters

Fifth.title: Fifth post
Fifth.content: Too late, my time has come Sends shivers down my spine Body 's aching all the time Goodbye everybody, I've got to go Gotta leave you all behind And face the truth

Sixth.title: Sixth post
Sixth.content: Mama, oh! (Anyway the wind blows) I don 't want to die But sometimes wish I 'd never been born at all

Seventh.title: Seventh post
Seventh.content: I see a little silhouette of a man Scaramouche, Scaramouche Will you do the Fandango ? Thunderbolt and lightning Very, very frightening me

Eighth.title: Eighth post
Eighth.content: Galileo. Galileo Galileo.Galileo Galileo, Figaro Magnifico!

Ninth.title: Ninth post
Ninth.content: I'm just a poor boy And nobody loves me He 's just a poor boy From a poor family Spare him his life from this monstruosity

Tenth.title: Tenth post
Tenth.content: Easy come, easy go Will you let me go ? Bismillah! No, we will not let you go(Let him go!) Bismillah!We will not let you go(Let him go!) Bismillah!We will not let you go(Let me go!) Will not let you go(Let me go!) Never, never let you go(Let me go!)

Eleventh.title: Eleventh post
Eleventh.content: Never let me go, oh! No, no, no, no, no, no, no Oh mama mia, mama mia Mama mia let me go Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me For me,for me

Twelfth.title: Twelfth post
Twelfth.content: So you think you can stone me And spit in my eye So you think you can love me And leave me to die

Thirteenth.title: Thirteenth post
Thirteenth.content: Oh baby, can't do this to me baby Just gotta get out Just gotta get right outta here

Fifteenth.title: Fifteenth post
Fifteenth.content: Nothing really matters Anyone can see Nothing really matters Nothing really matters to me (Anyway the wind blows)
